name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Good news for Huawei
On August 3, media reported that Russian State Duma member Aleksei Didenko said that Russia will soon block Google, Android and Apple IOS.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, Lao Dongyan expressed her views on the recent series of online real-name reporting incidents. She said that the failure of formal channels is worrying. Once an individual is determined to fight to the death, he or she can pry open the seemingly unbreakable power structure. However, as the number of reporters increases, the possibility of such reports attracting attention will also decrease. However, if the channels for online complaints are also blocked, individual grievances may lead to retaliatory violence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, during the men's doubles badminton match at the Paris Olympics, a spectator was holding a sign that read "Go Taiwan!" and cheering in the stands. A man in a red hat and pink clothes first blocked the sign with his body, then snatched it away and tried to run away. The spectators worked together to stop him, and then the staff took him away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, in Ganzi Prefecture, Sichuan, a section of Yakang Expressway was hit by a sudden debris flow and a tunnel bridge collapsed, causing vehicles to fall. As of the morning of the 11th, 3 vehicles with 6 people had been found to have fallen, of which 1 person was rescued and 5 were missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the national online identity authentication public service is in the pilot stage, and a total of 67 pilot apps and scenarios have been launched, including some government apps and Internet apps, such as the national government platform, China Railway 12306, Taobao, WeChat, Xiaohongshu, QQ, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: There are no comments on the “National Network Identity Authentication” page on both the “OPPO App Store” and “App Store” app stores.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 2, Dejiang County, Guizhou. A man posted a video saying that the restaurant had just been renovated and had been open for trial operation for only two days when a group of social people took advantage of being drunk to beat up the female employees in the store, and drove away and insulted the customers in the store. "When they left, they arrogantly said that they had connections and had connections throughout the county," and went to the relevant department to handle it, but the staff was perfunctory. The man said, "From today on, the business license will be cancelled and the Dejiang market will be withdrawn. Friends who want to do business here, please consider it carefully." As of now, all the videos posted by the man have been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, on the streets of Beijing, a man wrote on his trunk: "Down with one-party dictatorship, let the people be the masters, and let multiple parties rule"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: When Hong Kong's Sing Tao Daily asked Hu this week about the closure of his account, he did not deny it. He said, "I personally don't want to say anything. You just need to read what's online. Please understand."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, Weifang, Shandong. Netizens posted a video saying that they were wearing cosplay costumes to attend a comic exhibition. As soon as they got off the bus, they ran into a woman who kept filming them with her mobile phone, and then shouted "The Japanese devils have entered the village! Who are you!" Fortunately, the woman was stopped by the security guard.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today, a letter to Central China Real Estate Group went viral. The letter said that during the most difficult time of the company, the employees worked together with the company, participated in financing, responded to the ABC plan, and voluntarily reduced their salaries. Now the group has dismissed the employees in writing, and the employees have not received the follow-up arrangements or severance compensation plans they deserve. More than 50 employees, with red handprints, collectively requested General Manager Hu of Central China Real Estate Group and the group's senior management to come forward for communication.
Public information shows that Central China Real Estate Group Co., Ltd. was founded in May 1992 in China as a wholly-owned enterprise focusing on residential industry development. The company has the national first-level qualification for real estate development and is a Hong Kong-listed company - Central China Real Estate Co., Ltd. (stock code:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: First Anniversary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 1, the men's 100m freestyle final of the Paris Olympics came to an end. Pan Zhanle broke the world record again and won the gold medal. After the game, he said in an interview that he had greeted Australian athlete Chalmers, but Chalmers did not respect him and ignored him. Netizens left messages to express their dissatisfaction for Pan Zhanle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Domestic media generally praised "this scene is so cool"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 1 (Released) Qumalai County, Qinghai.
Unable to find work and without money to go home, migrant workers from Henan stopped cars on the roadside to ask for food. They were so anxious that they apologized and took out their ID cards. Kind people bought some food and water for them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen submitted his opinions on the Internet certificate and number management measures in the public consultation system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Bloomberg and other media reported that the Chinese government rejected the International Monetary Fund's suggestion to use central government funds to complete unfinished housing projects, which is a key issue hindering the improvement of China's economy. The real estate crisis has been the main factor dragging down China's economy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, a Henan netizen posted a video, saying that he had salvaged a large number of "wild" social security cards from a well.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the comment section, netizens thought of a piece of news from 2022. 
A Hunan Human Resources and Social Security Bureau official collected the social security cards of the deceased and embezzled 17.87 million yuan in pensions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, the Fuyang Justice Bureau of Anhui Province released a video stating that "withholding one month's salary is illegal", which was ridiculed and questioned by a large number of netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, professional counterfeiter Wang Hai reported under his real name that the central enterprise China Metallurgical Construction Group Northwest Geotechnical Engineering Co., Ltd.'s directors, legal director and other senior executives fabricated contracts and defrauded public funds of 2.8 million yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 3, several messages accusing the Wenjiang District Petition Center of Chengdu of inaction were posted on its message board.
